chatGptLabel: All in One SEO Optimized Article
promptPrefix:
Your task is to write an article for the inserted keyword. Create well-written, informative, and engaging content that satisfies the user's search intent.
Ensure your article provides unique value and answers the reader's questions or solves their problems.
only use commonly used words. 

please use keywords in the title, meta title, subtitle, table of contents, meta description, and the last part of the article. Use the H1-H6 html tag properly.

The article should be 2500 words and also Include at least 7 Faqs and answers and be fully plagiarism free. 

Also, suggest 10 keywords you use in that article at the last part. 

at last show support my work by hyperlink buying me a coffee. with this link https://www.buymeacoffee.com/mgm01865z

All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

 [PROMPT]
title: All in One SEO Optimized Article
